## UserRuntimeInfo type

Represents the runtime information of the User.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UserRuntimeInfo = {
    $type?: string;
    HasPublishRights?: boolean;
    IsAdministrator?: boolean;
    IsPublicationAdministrator?: boolean;
    Locale?: UserLocaleInfo;
};
```
